short_summary: Purchase of Office Seating for Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC)
description: Public Works Government Services Canada’s (PWGSC) Real Property Branch, on behalf of its client Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC), has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office seating to the National Capital Region by January 2024. Please disregard the CanadaBuys response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on October 18, 2023 by 2:00pm EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00pm EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. The full Request for Proposal (RFP) and attachments can only be accessed and downloaded when logged into your SAP Ariba account. https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17639317
full_summary:
### Office Seating RFP
Reference Number: WS4243686389
Modification Number: 1
Publication Date: October 5, 2023
Tender Closing Date: October 18, 2023
## Overview
Public Works Government Services Canada’s (PWGSC) Real Property Branch, on behalf of its client, the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC), is soliciting bids for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office seating in the National Capital Region (NCR) by January 2024. 
## Solicitation Details
* Solicitation Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Tender Status: Expiré (Expired)
* GSIN: None
* UNSPSC Code: 56101504 – Office Chairs
* Procurement Category: Government Department
* Notice Type: RFP against Supply Arrangement
* Procurement Method: Competitive – Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Region of Opportunity: None
## Contract Details
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* Contract Start Date: November 24, 2023 (Expected)
* Contract End Date: April 30, 2024 (Expected)
## Contact Information
* Michelle Wong (elle-la/she-her)
* michelle.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
## RFP URL and Attachments
* The full RFP and attachments can be accessed and downloaded by logging into your SAP Ariba account.
* https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17639317
* Response Deadline Closing Time: October 18, 2023, 2:00pm EDT. Bids submitted after this time will be deemed non-responsive. Please note that the CanadaBuys response deadline closing time should be disregarded. ## Unsolicited Note About the Timeline.

Prior to creating a tender document for the government, it is always a good practice to review it word for word. Would you like me to help you edit your work? Maybe add the following information to your review checklist:
- all correct business case and contract terms and conditions are used,
- copyrighted assets have been approved for use,
- all necessary government mandates have been met
- review any sensitive or brief material
